title: Google\Cloud\Storage\StorageObject
name: StorageObject
description: Objects are the individual pieces of data that you store in Google Cloud Storage.

params.name: connection
params.description: Represents a connection to Cloud Storage.

params.name: name
params.description: The object's name.

params.name: bucket
params.description: The name of the bucket the object is contained in.

params.name: generation
params.description: The generation of the object.

params.name: info
params.description: The object's metadata.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Check whether or not the object exists.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Update the object. Upon receiving a result the local object's data will be updated.

examples.caption: Add custom metadata to an existing object.

params.name: metadata
params.description: The available options for metadata are outlined at the JSON API docs

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.predefinedAcl
params.description: Apply a predefined set of access controls to this object.

params.name: options.projection
params.description: Determines which properties to return. May be either 'full' or 'noAcl'.

params.name: options.fields
params.description: Selector which will cause the response to only return the specified fields.

methods.name: copy
methods.description:
Copy the object to a destination bucket.

Please note that if the destination bucket is the same as the source bucket and a new name is not provided the source object will be replaced with the copy of itself.

examples.caption: Provide your destination bucket as a string and retain the source object's name.
Provide your destination bucket as a bucket object and choose a new name for the copied object.

params.name: destination
params.description: The destination bucket.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.name
params.description: The name of the destination object. Defaults to the name of the source object.

params.name: options.predefinedAcl
params.description: Access controls to apply to the destination object. Acceptable values include authenticatedRead, bucketOwnerFullControl, bucketOwnerRead, private, projectPrivate, and publicRead.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the destination object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current generation matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceGenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current generation does not match the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifSourceMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the source object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

methods.name: downloadToFile
methods.description: Download an object to a specified location.

params.name: path
params.description: Path to download file to.

params.name: options
params.description: Configuration Options.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Retrieves the object's details. If no object data is cached a network request will be made to retrieve it.

params.description: Configuration options.

params.name: options.ifGenerationMatch

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration matches the given value.

params.name: options.ifMetagenerationNotMatch
params.description: Makes the operation conditional on whether the object's current metageneration does not match the given value.

params.name: options.projection
params.description: Determines which properties to return. May be either 'full' or 'noAcl'.

methods.name: reload
methods.description: Triggers a network request to reload the object's details.
